SEARCH
Module HospitalManagementSystem
Package entities

Class Medicine

java.lang.Object
entities.Medicine
public class Medicine extends Object
Represents a medicine in the hospital management system. Tracks the medicine's name, current stock, and stock alert level.

  • Constructor Details

    • Medicine

      public Medicine()
      Default constructor for `Medicine`. Initializes the medicine with default values ("N/A", 0, 0).

    • Medicine

      public Medicine(String name, int stock, int stockAlert)
      Constructs a Medicine object with specified values.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the medicine.
      stock - The current stock of the medicine.
      stockAlert - The stock level at which an alert should be triggered.

  • Method Details

    • getMedicineName

      public String getMedicineName()
      Gets the name of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The name of the medicine.

    • getMedicineStock

      public int getMedicineStock()
      Gets the current stock of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The current stock of the medicine.

    • getMedicineStockAlert

      public int getMedicineStockAlert()
      Gets the stock alert level of the medicine.
      Returns:
      The stock alert level.

    • isLowStock

      public boolean isLowStock()
      Checks if the medicine stock is low based on the stock alert level.
      Returns:
      true if the stock is less than or equal to the alert level; false otherwise.

    • setMedicineName

      public void setMedicineName(String name)
      Sets the name of the medicine.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name of the medicine.

    • setMedicineStock

      public void setMedicineStock(int stock)
      Updates the stock level of the medicine. If the stock level drops below or equals the alert level, a warning message is displayed.
      Parameters:
      stock - The new stock level of the medicine.

    • setMedicineStockAlert

      public void setMedicineStockAlert(int stockAlert)
      Sets the stock alert level for the medicine.
      Parameters:
      stockAlert - The new stock alert level.
